<h2 class="section-title">2024</h2>


- [International Conference on Development Economics (ICDE)](https://icde2024.sciencesconf.org/), AMSE, Marseille, France. *Scheduled*

<h2 class="section-title">2023</h2>


- [20th World Congress of the International Economic Association](https://ieawc2023.org/), Universidad EAFIT, Medellin, Colombia.

- [9th Worshop Public Policies and Sustainable Development 2023 (FESP-Paris 1)](https://fesp-eg.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/Call_9thFEPS_Paris1.pdf), Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne, Paris, France. 

- UMR Développement & Sociétés/CIRED PhD Poster Session, Paris, France.

- [51st Research Conference on Communications, Information, and Internet Policy](http://www.tprcweb.com/overview-2023), Washington, USA.

- [7th Nordic Development Research Conference](https://www.nordev2023.se/), Uppsala University, Uppsala, Sweden.

- [UMR Développement & Sociétés PhD Seminar](https://umr-devsoc.pantheonsorbonne.fr/), Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne, Paris, France.

- [32nd ITS European Conference](https://itseurope.org/2023/), UNED, Madrid, Spain.

- [71st Congress of the French Economic Association (AFSE)](https://afse2023.sciencesconf.org/), SciencesPo, Paris, France.

- [1st Welfare & Policy Conference](https://wapsociety.org/event/conference-individual-and-collective-responses-to-a-troubled-world), BSE, Bordeaux, France.

- [18th Doctorissimes PhD Conference](https://sites.google.com/site/doctorissimes3/18th-doctorissimes-2023), CES, Paris, France.

<h2 class="section-title">2022</h2>

- [Young Economist Seminar](https://www.digitaleconomics-paris.fr/young-economist-seminar), Telecom-Paris, Palaiseau, France.

- [25th QED (Quantative Economics Doctorate Network) Jamboree](https://www.vgse.at/about-vgse/qed-network/), University of Vienna, Vienna, Austria.

- [31st ITS European Regional Conference](https://itseurope.org/2022/), Chalmers University of Technology, Goteborg, Sweden.

- [EADI conference](https://iedes.pantheonsorbonne.fr/evenements/iedes-eadi-france-journee-detude-internationale), Agence Française de Développement, Paris, France.
